node.text:
Christmas is so much more than just a season. It's that magical feeling that permeates the air and our spirits! Stay tuned for carols, band performances, goodies galore, unlimited spirits and a lavish buffet spread coming up for Christmas Eve on December 24th

For bookings contact: 0471 – 3051234, 1800-4252-2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com, reservations@theraviz.com
